title: Aquaman
description: Arthur Curry exists between worlds, but must protect both the land and the underwater city of Atlantis.
altHero: a man in a suit jumps into the ocean as a huge wave approaches
alt2: people are running panicked including a mom and her small child
alt3: Vincent Chase as Arthur Curry looks off in the distance and begins undoing his necktie
alt4: a lone Arthur Curry runs in the opposite direction toward the water
